title: Response to BJP’s Yaswant Singh Lok Sabha speech on Sri Lanka
content: – by Shenali Waduge – Response to BJP’s Yaswant Singh Lok Sabha speech on Sri Lanka The speech by former foreign minister Mr. Yashwant Singh recently to the members of the Lok Sabha was moving and drew attention to genocide of Tamils by Sri Lanka with a 7 point plan proposed by the BJP.
